title: Senior Talent Acquisition
description:
•	In charge of technical recruitment for Vietnam team, including the following roles: Engineering Manager, Software Engineer, QA Engineer, UX Designer, Technical Writer…
•	Leverage a variety of mediums to proactively source and seek out top talent in the market; Update the pool of candidates for future recruitment. 
•	Develop recruitment programs that align with our company goals and drive employment branding initiatives
•	Build effective relationships with hiring managers and candidates to understand hiring requirements and technical skillsets
•	Manage successful working relationships with stakeholders (candidates, line managers, internal departments, etc.), working as a seamless part of the HR operation
•	Drive internal event and team – building activities
•	Other duties and special projects as assigned
requirements:
•	Minimum 3 years of experience in full-cycle technical recruitment, ideally in the IT industry
•	Strong experience with proactive sourcing and building high-quality talent pipelines
•	Experience in candidate management, interview management
•	Strong verbal and written communication skills (both with English and Vietnamese)
•	Passion for working in a fast-paced, results-oriented environment
•	Technical experience is a plus
